Highlight Texts For More Info!.Description: = Have A Fantastic Day & Happy Fishing! =

Disable Yearly Developer Gifts.Description: This setting will disable the mod developer gifts you will receive yearly. By default, you will receive a yearly randomized gift from myself :-)

Fishing Difficulty.Description: Select a difficulty setting for the fishing minigame. Easy Settings: Decrease difficulty by 5% to 100%. Easy Sunday Fishing: Decrease difficulty by 10% to 30% on Sundays only. Hard Settings: Increase difficulty by 5% to 100% with a NIGHTMARE option for those seeking the ultimate challenge! For details on the Dynamic Weather settings, highlight the 'Dynamic Weather Info' below for more information. Scroll down for additional options.
Fishing Difficulty.AllowValues: Default, 5% Easier, 10% Easier, 15% Easier, 20% Easier, 25% Easier, 30% Easier, 35% Easier, 40% Easier, 45% Easier, 50% Easier, 55% Easier, 60% Easier, 65% Easier, 70% Easier, 75% Easier, 80% Easier, 85% Easier, 90% Easier, 95% Easier, 100% Easier, 10% Easy Sunday, 20% Easy Sunday, 30% Easy Sunday, 40% Easy Sunday, 50% Easy Sunday, 5% Harder, 10% Harder, 15% Harder, 20% Harder, 25% Harder, 30% Harder, 35% Harder, 40% Harder, 45% Harder, 50% Harder, 55% Harder, 60% Harder, 65% Harder, 70% Harder, 75% Harder, 80% Harder, 85% Harder, 90% Harder, 95% Harder, 100% Harder, NIGHTMARE, Dynamic Weather (Easy), Dynamic Weather (Easier), Dynamic Weather (Easiest)

= Dynamic Weather Info =.Description: If you select a Dynamic Weather setting for Fishing Difficulty, this will change fishing difficulty based on the weather. The settings are as follows; Easy Setting: Wind = 15% Harder, Rain = 10% Easier, Snow = 15% Easier, Storm = 20% Easier. The Easier option will make those options easier by another 10% and Easiest by another 20%.

All Times Of Day.Description: All fish are now catchable at any time of day.

All Types Of Weather.Description: All fish, except legendary fish, can now be caught in all types of weather.

All Seasons.Description: All fish, except legendary fish, can now be caught in every season.

Same Spawn Rates.Description: All fish, except legendary fish, now share the same spawn rates.

Clean Waters/No Trash.Description: Select a setting to remove or replace all trash items while fishing. No Trash: Disables trash while fishing entirely. Crab Pot Fish: Replaces trash items with crab pot fish during fishing. Note that occasional trash items may still be fished up. Trash serves as a fallback if no fish spawn, but these settings significantly reduce trash chances.
Clean Waters/No Trash.AllowValues: Default, No Trash, Crab Pot Fish

Clean Waters/No Weeds.Description: Select a setting to remove or replace Seaweed, Green Algae, and White Algae while fishing. No Weeds and Algae: Disables all weeds and algae while fishing entirely. Crab Pot Fish: Replaces seaweed and algae with crab pot fish during fishing.
Clean Waters/No Weeds.AllowValues: Default, No Weeds and Algae, Crab Pot Fish

Crab Pots No Trash.Description: Crab Pots will no longer yield trash items, but there remains a small chance of obtaining Broken Glasses and CDs.

Crab Pots Bug Meat.Description: Crab Pots now spawn Bug Meat. Choose whether they can spawn in freshwater (rivers and lakes) or the ocean (beach).

Fish Sell Value.Description: Select the sell value of all fish (except legendary fish). The range is from 10% to 1000% increase. Refer to the Legendary Fish Sell Values setting below to do the same for legendary fish. Note that enabling or disabling these settings affects newly acquired fish after your chosen setting is enabled. Scroll down for additional options.
Fish Sell Value.AllowValues: Default, Increase by 10%, Increase by 20%, Increase by 30%, Increase by 40%, Increase by 50%, Increase by 60%, Increase by 70%, Increase by 80%, Increase by 90%, Increase by 100%, Increase by 125%, Increase by 150%, Increase by 175%, Increase by 200%, Increase by 225%, Increase by 250%, Increase by 275%, Increase by 300%, Increase by 325%, Increase by 350%, Increase by 375%, Increase by 400%, Increase by 425%, Increase by 450%, Increase by 475%, Increase by 500%, Increase by 525%, Increase by 550%, Increase by 575%, Increase by 600%, Increase by 625%, Increase by 650%, Increase by 675%, Increase by 700%, Increase by 725%, Increase by 750%, Increase by 775%, Increase by 800%, Increase by 825%, Increase by 850%, Increase by 875%, Increase by 900%, Increase by 925%, Increase by 950%, Increase by 975%, Increase by 1000%

Seasonal Fish On Farm.Description: Seasonal Fish are now catchable on the farm, across all farm maps.

Specialty Fish On Farm.Description: Specialty Fish are now catchable on the farm, across all farm maps.

Legendary Fish On Farm.Description: Legendary Fish are now catchable on the farm, across all farm maps. Only one legendary fish can be caught on a farm map unless you enable the 'Recatch Legendary Fish' option which will allow you to catch more than one.

Recatch Legendary Fish.Description: Legendary fish can now be caught multiple times.

Entire Area Legendary Fish.Description: Legendary fish are no longer restricted to specific points on the map; they can now be caught anywhere within their residing area. For instance, the Crimsonfish can be found all around the beach, not solely at the eastern docks.

All Weather Legendary Fish.Description: Legendary fish can now be caught in all types of weather.

All Seasons Legendary Fish.Description: Legendary fish can now be caught in every season.

Legendary Quests (Recatch REQ).Description: Unlock new quests related to legendary fish! Keep in mind that the ‘Recatch Legendary Fish’ setting must be enabled for this feature to function. Once you’ve successfully caught a legendary fish and are in the appropriate season, these new quests will become available.

Legendary Fish Sell Value.Description: Select the sell value of legendary fish. The range is from 10% to 1000% increase. Note that enabling or disabling these settings affects newly acquired legendary fish after your chosen setting is enabled. Scroll down for additional options.
Legendary Fish Sell Value.AllowValues: Default, Increase by 10%, Increase by 20%, Increase by 30%, Increase by 40%, Increase by 50%, Increase by 60%, Increase by 70%, Increase by 80%, Increase by 90%, Increase by 100%, Increase by 125%, Increase by 150%, Increase by 175%, Increase by 200%, Increase by 225%, Increase by 250%, Increase by 275%, Increase by 300%, Increase by 325%, Increase by 350%, Increase by 375%, Increase by 400%, Increase by 425%, Increase by 450%, Increase by 475%, Increase by 500%, Increase by 525%, Increase by 550%, Increase by 575%, Increase by 600%, Increase by 625%, Increase by 650%, Increase by 675%, Increase by 700%, Increase by 725%, Increase by 750%, Increase by 775%, Increase by 800%, Increase by 825%, Increase by 850%, Increase by 875%, Increase by 900%, Increase by 925%, Increase by 950%, Increase by 975%, Increase by 1000%, Decrease by 10%, Decrease by 20%, Decrease by 30%, Decrease by 40%, Decrease by 50%, Decrease by 60%, Decrease by 70%, Decrease by 80%, Decrease by 90%, Decrease by 99%

Rare Legendary Fish.Description: Select the rarity of legendary fish appearing while fishing.
Rare Legendary Fish.AllowValues: Default, Rare, Very Rare, Near Impossible

Lucky Legendary Fish.Description: Legendary fish now only spawn when daily luck from the TV is at its highest.

Curious Legendary Fish.Description: Select the effectiveness of the Curiosity Lure buff for Legendary Fish. This range spans from 10% to 100%. Scroll down for additional options.
Curious Legendary Fish.AllowValues: Default, Increase by 10%, Increase by 15%, Increase by 20%, Increase by 25%, Increase by 30%, Increase by 35%, Increase by 40%, Increase by 45%, Increase by 50%, Increase by 55%, Increase by 60%, Increase by 65%, Increase by 70%, Increase by 75%, Increase by 80%, Increase by 85%, Increase by 90%, Increase by 95%, Increase by 100%

Legendary Fish Gifts.Description: Legendary fish are now a universally loved gift for all the villagers.

Legendary Fish 7am To 9am.Description: Legendary fish are now exclusively accessible from 7AM to 9AM, and this time frame can be combined with the other time settings.

Legendary Fish 12pm To 2pm.Description: Legendary fish are now exclusively accessible from 12PM to 2PM, and this time frame can be combined with the other time settings.

Legendary Fish 11pm To 1am.Description: Legendary fish are now exclusively accessible from 11PM to 1AM, and this time frame can be combined with the other time settings.

Qi's Legendary Fish Icon.Description: The Legendary Fish that appear during Qi’s Special Order Request will now be distinguished by the ‘Boss Fish’ icon in the fishing minigame.

Fish Pond Rare Loot.Description: Select the likelihood of rare loot spawning from fish pond buildings. Options range from 2X to 5X increase. Alternatively, the Rare Loot Chance All 50% option ensures an equal chance for all rare loot from fish ponds to appear. Scroll down for additional options.
Fish Pond Rare Loot.AllowValues: Default, Rare Loot Chance 2X, Rare Loot Chance 3X, Rare Loot Chance 4X, Rare Loot Chance 5X, Rare Loot Chance All 50%

FP Fish/Quest Spawn Time.Description: Select the speed for fish reproduction and when new fish pond quests appear from fish pond buildings. These options will take effect only when the fish pond is empty, and you’ve enabled the desired setting before adding fish.
FP Fish/Quest Spawn Time.AllowValues: Default, Half The Time, Every Day

Fish Pond Legendary Fish (REQ).Description: Legendary fish can now be added to the fish pond buildings. This setting is required for the legendary fish pond settings below!

Legendary Fish Pond Loot.Description: Select the likelihood of legendary fish rare loot spawning from fish pond buildings. The available settings range from 2X to 5X increase. The Rare Loot Chance All 50% option ensures that all rare loot from fish ponds has an equal chance to spawn. Note: This feature requires the Fish Pond Legendary Fish (REQ) setting to be enabled!
Legendary Fish Pond Loot.AllowValues: Default, Rare Loot Chance 2X, Rare Loot Chance 3X, Rare Loot Chance 4X, Rare Loot Chance 5X, Rare Loot Chance All 50%

LG Fish/Quest Spawn Time.Description: Select the speed for legendary fish reproduction and when new legendary fish pond quests appear from fish pond buildings. This feature requires the Fish Pond Legendary Fish (REQ) setting to be enabled! These options will take effect only when the fish pond is empty, and you’ve enabled the desired setting before adding fish.
LG Fish/Quest Spawn Time.AllowValues: Default, Half The Time, Every Day

Fish Pond Prismatic Shards.Description: Every fish pond building now has the opportunity to yield Prismatic Shards when the fish ponds are at full capacity.

Tackle Materials.Description: Reduce the material requirements for crafting tackle and lures.

Tackle Fishing Level 1.Description: All tackle can now be learned at Fishing Level 1.

Craftable Curiosity Lure.Description: The Curiosity Lure can now be crafted, and the recipe will be learned either at Fishing Level 9 or Level 1. This lure enhances the likelihood of rare fish spawning.

Curiosity Lure Materials.Description: Reduce the material requirements for crafting the Curiosity Lure. Note that this feature requires the Craftable Curiosity Lure setting to be enabled!

Wild Bait Crafting Materials.Description: Reduce the material requirements for crafting Wild Bait.

Trout Soup Duration.Description: The Trout Soup food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Trout Soup Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Trout Soup food item. By default, it grants a +1 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +2 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Trout Soup Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+1), Fishing Level +2, Fishing Level +3, Fishing Level +4, Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Trout Soup Ingredients.Description: Select an option to reduce the ingredient requirements for the Trout Soup recipe.
Trout Soup Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Chowder Duration.Description: The Chowder food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Chowder Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Chowder food item. By default, it grants a +1 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +2 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Chowder Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+1), Fishing Level +2, Fishing Level +3, Fishing Level +4, Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Chowder Ingredients.Description: Select an option to reduce the ingredient requirements for the Chowder recipe.
Chowder Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Shrimp Cocktail Duration.Description: The Shrimp Cocktail food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Shrimp Cocktail Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Shrimp Cocktail food item. By default, it grants a +1 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +2 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Shrimp Cocktail Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+1), Fishing Level +2, Fishing Level +3, Fishing Level +4, Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Shrimp Cocktail Ingredients.Description: Select an option to reduce the ingredient requirements for the Shrimp Cocktail recipe.
Shrimp Cocktail Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Fish Taco Duration.Description: The Fish Taco food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Fish Taco Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Fish Taco food item. By default, it grants a +2 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +3 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Fish Taco Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+2), Fishing Level +3, Fishing Level +4, Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Fish Taco Ingredients.Description: Select an option to reduce the ingredient requirements for the Fish Taco recipe.
Fish Taco Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Escargot Duration.Description: The Escargot food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Escargot Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Escargot food item. By default, it grants a +2 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +3 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Escargot Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+2), Fishing Level +3, Fishing Level +4, Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Escargot Ingredients.Description: Select an option to reduce the ingredient requirements for the Escargot recipe.
Escargot Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Dish O' The Sea Duration.Description: The Dish O' The Sea food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Dish O' The Sea Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Dish O' The Sea food item. By default, it grants a +3 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +4 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Dish O' The Sea Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+3), Fishing Level +4, Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Dish O' The Sea Fishing Level 1.Description: The Dish O' The Sea recipe is now accessible at Fishing Level 1, rather than Level 3.

Dish O' The Sea Ingredients.Description: Select an option to reduce the ingredient requirements for the Dish O' The Sea recipe.
Dish O' The Sea Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Fish Stew Duration.Description: The Fish Stew food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Fish Stew Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Fish Stew food item. By default, it grants a +3 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +4 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Fish Stew Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+3), Fishing Level +4, Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Fish Stew Ingredients.Description: Select an option to reduce the ingredient requirements for the Fish Stew recipe.
Fish Stew Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Lobster Bisque Duration.Description: The Lobster Bisque food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Lobster Bisque Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Lobster Bisque food item. By default, it grants a +3 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +4 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Lobster Bisque Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+3), Fishing Level +4, Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Lobster Bisque Ingredients.Description: Select an option to reduce the ingredient requirements for the Lobster Bisque recipe.
Lobster Bisque Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Seafoam Pudding Duration.Description: The Seafoam Pudding food item buffs will now persist for a full day.

Seafoam Pudding Level Boost.Description: Select the fishing level boost provided by the Seafoam Pudding food item. By default, it grants a +4 level boost to fishing, but you can adjust it within a range of +5 to +50. Scroll down for additional options.
Seafoam Pudding Level Boost.AllowValues: Default (+4), Fishing Level +5, Fishing Level +6, Fishing Level +7, Fishing Level +8, Fishing Level +9, Fishing Level +10, Fishing Level +15, Fishing Level +20, Fishing Level +25, Fishing Level +30, Fishing Level +35, Fishing Level +40, Fishing Level +45, Fishing Level +50

Seafoam Pudding Fishing Level 1.Description: The Seafoam Pudding recipe is now accessible at Fishing Level 1, rather than Level 9.

Seafoam Pudding Ingredients.Description: Reduce the ingredient requirements for the Seafoam Pudding recipe, allowing for a range of 1 to 25 of any fish.
Seafoam Pudding Ingredients.AllowValues: Default, Lessened Ingredients, 1 of Any Fish

Worm Bin Materials.Description: Reduce the material requirements for crafting the Worm Bin machine.

Worm Bin Level Availability.Description: Select the fishing level at which you can learn the Worm Bin crafting recipe.
Worm Bin Level Availability.AllowValues: Default (Level 4), Fishing Level 3, Fishing Level 2, Fishing Level 1

Worm Bin Bait Min Amount.Description: Select the minimum daily bait production from the Worm Bin, with options ranging from 2 to 100. Scroll down for additional options.

Worm Bin Bait Max Amount.Description: Select the maximum daily bait production from the Worm Bin, with options ranging from 6 to 100. Scroll down for additional options.

Worm Bin Wild Bait (REQ).Description: Worm Bins now possess a slight chance of producing Wild Bait. This feature is essential for configuring the Wild Bait settings below!

Worm Bin Wild Bait Chance.Description: Select the probability of daily Wild Bait production from the Worm Bin. The available range spans from 15% to 100% chance. Note that this feature requires the Worm Bin Chance For Wild Bait (REQ) setting to be enabled! Scroll down for additional options.
Worm Bin Wild Bait Chance.AllowValues: Default (10%), 15% Chance, 20% Chance, 25% Chance, 30% Chance, 35% Chance, 40% Chance, 45% Chance, 50% Chance, 55% Chance, 60% Chance, 65% Chance, 70% Chance, 75% Chance, 80% Chance, 85% Chance, 90% Chance, 95% Chance, 100% Chance

Worm Bin Wild Bait Min Amount.Description: Select the minimum daily production of Wild Bait from the Worm Bin, with a range spanning from 2 to 100. Note that this feature requires the Worm Bin Chance For Wild Bait (REQ) setting to be enabled! Scroll down for additional options.

Worm Bin Wild Bait Max Amount.Description: Select the maximum daily production of Wild Bait from the Worm Bin, with a range spanning from 6 to 100. Note that this feature requires the Worm Bin Chance For Wild Bait (REQ) setting to be enabled! Scroll down for additional options.

Deluxe Worm Bin Materials.Description: Reduce the material requirements for crafting the Deluxe Worm Bin machine.

Deluxe Worm Bin Lvl Availability.Description: Select the fishing level at which you can learn the Deluxe Worm Bin crafting recipe.
Deluxe Worm Bin Lvl Availability.AllowValues: Default (Level 8), Fishing Level 6, Fishing Level 4, Fishing Level 2

Deluxe Worm Bin Bait Min.Description: Select the minimum daily bait production from the Deluxe Worm Bin, with options ranging from 2 to 100. Scroll down for additional options.

Deluxe Worm Bin Bait Max.Description: Select the maximum daily bait production from the Deluxe Worm Bin, with options ranging from 6 to 100. Scroll down for additional options.

Deluxe Worm Bin Wild Bait (REQ).Description: Deluxe Worm Bins now possess a slight chance of producing Wild Bait. This feature is essential for configuring the Wild Bait settings below!

Deluxe Worm Bin Wild B. Chance.Description: Select the probability of daily Wild Bait production from the Deluxe Worm Bin. The available range spans from 15% to 100% chance. Note that this feature requires the Deluxe Worm Bin Chance For Wild Bait (REQ) setting to be enabled! Scroll down for additional options.
Deluxe Worm Bin Wild B. Chance.AllowValues: Default (10%), 15% Chance, 20% Chance, 25% Chance, 30% Chance, 35% Chance, 40% Chance, 45% Chance, 50% Chance, 55% Chance, 60% Chance, 65% Chance, 70% Chance, 75% Chance, 80% Chance, 85% Chance, 90% Chance, 95% Chance, 100% Chance

Deluxe Worm Bin Wild Bait Min.Description: Select the minimum daily production of Wild Bait from the Deluxe Worm Bin, with a range spanning from 2 to 100. Note that this feature requires the Deluxe Worm Bin Chance For Wild Bait (REQ) setting to be enabled! Scroll down for additional options.

Deluxe Worm Bin Wild Bait Max.Description: Select the maximum daily production of Wild Bait from the Deluxe Worm Bin, with a range spanning from 6 to 100. Note that this feature requires the Deluxe Worm Bin Chance For Wild Bait (REQ) setting to be enabled! Scroll down for additional options.

Recycling Machine Faster.Description: Reduce the production time for Recycling Machines, with options ranging from 50 minutes to 10 minutes. Scroll down for additional options.

Recycling Machine Materials.Description: Reduce the material requirements for crafting Recycling Machines.

Recycling Machine Level Avail..Description: Select the fishing level at which you can acquire the Recycling Machine crafting recipe.
Recycling Machine Level Avail..AllowValues: Default (Level 4), Fishing Level 3, Fishing Level 2, Fishing Level 1

Recycling Machine Tackle.Description: Recycling Machines will now occasionally yield fishing tackle from all trash items.

Recycling Prismatic Shards.Description: Recycling Machines now have a slight chance of yielding a Prismatic Shard from trash items.

Fish Shop Open All Days.Description: Willy’s Fishing Shop will now remain open every day, except during special event days.

Crab Pot Price.Description: Select the price of crab pots at Willy’s Fishing Shop. The available range spans from 1g to 3000g. Scroll down for additional options.

Iridium Fishing Rod Level 1.Description: The Iridium Fishing Rod will now be offered for sale at Fishing Level 1 in Willy’s Fishing Shop.

All Fishing Rod Prices.Description: Select the price of the Iridium Fishing Rod at Willy’s Fishing Shop. The available range spans from 25% to 100% cheaper, or from 25% to 100% more expensive. Scroll down for additional options.
All Fishing Rod Prices.AllowValues: Default, 25% Cheaper, 50% Cheaper, 75% Cheaper, 99% Cheaper, 25% More Expensive, 50% More Expensive, 75% More Expensive, 100% More Expensive

Fishing Shop Curiosity/Quality.Description: Willy’s Fishing Shop now sells the Curiosity and Quality lures for sale. These lures become available once you reach Fishing Level 9.

All Tackle Fishing Level 1.Description: At Fishing Level 1, all tackle is now available for sale at Willy’s Fishing Shop.

Fishing Shop Tackle Prices.Description: Select the sale price of all lures at Willy’s Fishing Shop. This range spans from 25% to 99% cheaper, or from 25% to 100% more expensive. Scroll down for additional options.
Fishing Shop Tackle Prices.AllowValues: Default, 25% Cheaper, 50% Cheaper, 75% Cheaper, 99% Cheaper, 25% More Expensive, 50% More Expensive, 75% More Expensive, 100% More Expensive

Fishing Shop Seafoam Pudding.Description: Willy’s Fishing Shop now sells the Seafoam Pudding food item. You can decide whether to make it available at Fishing Level 9 or Level 1.

Fishing Shop Seafoam P Price.Description: Select the sale price of the Seafoam Pudding food item at Willy’s Shop. This range spans from 4000g to 1g. Please note that the Fishing Shop Seafoam Pudding setting must be enabled for this to take effect! Scroll down for additional options.

Fishing Shop Worm Bin (REQ).Description: Willy’s Shop now sells the Worm Bin. This setting is essential for configuring the Worm Bin settings below!

Fishing Shop Worm Bin Price.Description: Select the sale price of the Worm Bin at Willy’s Shop. This range spans from 4000g to 1g. Please note that the Fishing Shop Worm Bin (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect! Scroll down for additional options.

Fishing Shop Worm Bin Avail..Description: Select the required fishing level for unlocking the Worm Bin at Willy’s Shop. Please note that the Fishing Shop Worm Bin (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect! Scroll down for additional options.
Fishing Shop Worm Bin Avail..AllowValues: Default (Level 8), Fishing Level 6, Fishing Level 4, Fishing Level 2, Fishing Level 1

Fish Shop Recycle Machine (REQ).Description: Willy’s Shop now sells the Recycling Machine. This setting is essential for configuring the Recycling Machine settings below!

Fish Shop Recycle Machine Price.Description: Select the sale price of the Recycling Machine at Willy’s Shop. This range spans from 3000g to 1g. Please note that the Fish Shop Recycle Machine (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect! Scroll down for additional options.

Fish Shop Recycle Machine Avail..Description: Select the required fishing level for unlocking the Recycling Machine at Willy’s Shop. Please note that the Fish Shop Recycle Machine (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect!
Fish Shop Recycle Machine Avail..AllowValues: Default (Level 4), Fishing Level 3, Fishing Level 2, Fishing Level 1

Fishable Prismatic Shards (REQ).Description: Prismatic Shards are now available for fishing and can be caught in most locations. This setting is essential for configuring most of the Prismatic Shard settings below!

Prismatic Shard Sell Value.Description: Select the sell value of Prismatic Shards. The default value is 2000g, but you can adjust it within a range from 1750g to 1g. Importantly, this setting operates independently and does not rely on any other Prismatic Shard configurations! Scroll down for additional options.

Prismatic Shards Fish Tanks.Description: Prismatic Shards can now be added to the aquarium fish tanks. Importantly, this setting operates independently and does not rely on any other Prismatic Shard configurations!

Prismatic Shard Spawn Rate.Description: Select the spawn rate of fishable Prismatic Shards. Please note that the Fishable Prismatic Shards (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect! Scroll down for additional options.
Prismatic Shard Spawn Rate.AllowValues: Default (15%), Common (30%), Very Common (50%), Rare (10%), Very Rare (5%), Near Impossible (1%)

Prismatic Shards On Farm.Description: Prismatic Shards can now be caught on the farm, and this applies to all farm maps. Please note that the Fishable Prismatic Shards (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect!

Lucky Prismatic Shards.Description: The spawn rate of Prismatic Shards varies based on the daily luck reported by the TV. Please note that the Fishable Prismatic Shards (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect!

Prismatic Shards Weather.Description: Prismatic Shards are now exclusive to rainy and snowy weather for catching. Please note that the Fishable Prismatic Shards (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect!

Prismatic Shards 7am To 9am.Description: Prismatic Shards are now exclusive to the hours between 7AM and 9AM for catching, and this time frame can be combined with the other time settings. Please note that the Fishable Prismatic Shards (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect!

Prismatic Shards 12pm To 2pm.Description: Prismatic Shards are now exclusive to the hours between 12PM and 2PM for catching, and this time frame can be combined with the other time settings. Please note that the Fishable Prismatic Shards (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect!

Prismatic Shards 11pm To 1am.Description: Prismatic Shards are now exclusive to the hours between 11PM and 1AM for catching, and this time frame can be combined with the other time settings. Please note that the Fishable Prismatic Shards (REQ) setting must be enabled for this to take effect!

Pufferfish Exclusion.Description: Pufferfish are now excluded from the fishing minigame. As a result, you will be limited to catching just one.

Anchovy Exclusion.Description: Anchovy are now excluded from the fishing minigame. As a result, you will be limited to catching just one.

Tuna Exclusion.Description: Tuna are now excluded from the fishing minigame. As a result, you will be limited to catching just one.

Sardine Exclusion.Description: Sardine are now excluded from the fishing minigame. As a result, you will be limited to catching just one.

Bream Exclusion.Description: Bream are now excluded from the fishing minigame. As a result, you will be limited to catching just one.
